description: A record indicating that a card was removed from a collection by the collection owner.

main.description: A record representing the removal of a collection link by a collection owner when they cannot delete the original link (which exists in another user's repository).

collection.description: Strong reference to the collection record.

removedLink.description: Strong reference to the collectionLink record that is being removed.

removedBy.description: DID of the user who removed the link (typically the collection owner).

removedAt.description: Timestamp when the link was removed from the collection.
